amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 112-296 to exempt all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 244 (Roll no. 874).
